settings.html:
<style>
.view-service-button a{
    transition: all 0.3s;
}
.view-service-button:hover a{
    color: #000 !important;
}

.angle-box:before{
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 30px;
    width: 2px;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: #D0D0D0;
    transform: skewX(45deg);
    transform-origin: top right;
}

.marquee-content .elementor-icon-list-items{
    display: flex;
    width: 10000px;
    transform: translateX(0px);
    animation: marquee 22s linear infinite;
    white-space: nowrap;
    
}

.marquee-content:hover .elementor-icon-list-items{
    -webkit-animation-play-state: paused;
}

.marquee-content .elementor-icon-list-text{
    -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #02050a;
}

@keyframes marquee {
    from {
        transform: translateX(0);
    }
    to {
        transform: translateX(-50%);
    }
}


.button .elementor-button .elementor-button-icon svg{
    margin-bottom: -3px!important;
}

.button-icon .elementor-button .elementor-button-icon svg{
    font-size: 20px!important;
    margin-bottom: -4px!important;
    rotate: -45deg;
}

@keyframes marquee {
   0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0px);
    transform: translateX(0px);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-1500px);
    transform: translateX(-1500px);
  }
}

.counter .elementor-counter-title{
    margin-left: 8px;
    padding-top: 10px;
}

.service-box .elementor-icon{
    border-color: #222222!important;
}

.service-box{
    transition: all 0.3s;
}
.service-box.active {
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.service-box{
    background-color: #0E0E0E!important;
}

.service-box.active::before {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255,0.03)!important;
}

.service-box.active{
    border: 0!important;
}

.service-box.active .tittle .elementor-heading-title{
    color: var(--e-global-color-secondary)!important;
}

.service-box.active .elementor-icon{
    border-color: var(--e-global-color-secondary)!important;
}



.scrollable-content {
    display: flex;
    overflow-x: auto;
    scroll-behavior: smooth;

    /* Hide scrollbar */
    -ms-overflow-style: none; /* IE and Edge */
    scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */
}

.scrollable-content::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none; /* Chrome, Safari, and Opera */
}






@media (max-width:1024px){
    .process:hover{
        margin-left: 0!important;
    }
}

.circle-shape{
    filter: blur(300px);
}

.trusted-rotated{
    animation: Rotate 15s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes Rotate {
  from { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

.testimonial .elementskit-commentor-content{
    border-bottom: 1px solid #222222!important;
}

.testimonial .swiper-pagination{
    justify-content: right!important;
    padding: 12px 16px;
    border: 1px solid #222222;
    border-radius: 100px;
    align-items: right;
    position: absolute;
    left: 88%;
    width: fit-content;
}
@media (max-width:767px){
    .testimonial .swiper-pagination{
         left: 0;
         bottom: -60px!important;
    }
}

.circle-bluer{
    filter: blur(200px);
}

.faq  .e-n-accordion-item[open] > .e-n-accordion-item-title {
    padding-bottom: 12px!important;
}

.post .elementskit-post-image-card{
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .0);
    box-shadow: 90px 0px 0px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .0);
}

.post  .elementskit-post-image-card:hover .elementskit-entry-thumb>img {
    -webkit-transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
    opacity: 1;
}
</style>

<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>

<script>

const serviceBoxes = document.querySelectorAll('.service-box');


const defaultActiveBox = document.querySelector('.service-box.active');


serviceBoxes.forEach(box => {
    box.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        if (defaultActiveBox.classList.contains('active')) {
            defaultActiveBox.classList.remove('active');
        }

        box.classList.add('active');
    });

    box.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
       
        box.classList.remove('active');
    
        const anyActive = document.querySelector('.service-box.active');
        if (!anyActive) {
            defaultActiveBox.classList.add('active');
        }
    });
});


document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
 
    const blogImages = document.querySelectorAll(".post .elementskit-entry-header .elementskit-entry-thumb > img");


    if (blogImages.length >= 3) {
   
        blogImages[0].style.height = "400px";
        blogImages[0].style.objectFit = "cover";

        blogImages[1].style.height = "320px";
        blogImages[1].style.objectFit = "cover";

        blogImages[2].style.height = "440px";
        blogImages[2].style.objectFit = "cover";
    }
});

jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
    const scrollAmount = 300;

    // Scroll left button
    $('.scroll-btn.left').on('click', function(event) {
        event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default behavior
        $('.scrollable-content').animate({
            scrollLeft: '-=' + scrollAmount
        }, 300); // Adjust speed as needed
    });

    // Scroll right button
    $('.scroll-btn.right').on('click', function(event) {
        event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default behavior
        $('.scrollable-content').animate({
            scrollLeft: '+=' + scrollAmount
        }, 300); // Adjust speed as needed
    });
});

</script>
